connectfour

Class ConnectFourFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • connectfour.ConnectFourFactory

  • public class ConnectFourFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class that creates enforces single ConnectFour games of its subclasses SinglePlayerConnectFour or MultiPlayerConnectFour allows to pre-register ConnectFourListeners and Creates a GameInformer instance if it is not previously created assures that the ConnectFourListeners will always be maintained it also returns a view of a ConnectFourGame if asked
    Version:
    1.0 August 7, 2016
    Author:
    Arturo Muller
